sync.summary: Sync your Server Profile with your Roblox Account.
sync.signup:
## Connect Roblox Account
You must be new to mellow, click Continue to connect your Roblox Account.
~~This message will update with your server profile status after you link a Roblox Account.~~
The functionality above is currently under maintenance, please execute this command again upon completion.
sync.complete.true.2: Your roles and nickname have been updated.
sync.complete.false:
## Server Profile is up-to-date
Your server profile is already up-to-date, no adjustments have been made.

If you were expecting a different result, you may need to wait a few minutes.
sync.complete.removed2: has been removed from this server
sync.complete.removed.0: This member has been banned for meeting the requirements of a ban action.
sync.complete.removed.1: This member has been kicked for meeting the requirements of a kick action.
sync.no_server:
## Cannot Sync Profile
This server has not been set-up with mellow yet,
forcesync.disabled:
## Cannot Sync Profile(s)
Sorry, forceful syncing has been disabled in this server, if you manage this server, enable it [here](https://www.voxelified.com/mellow/server/{{0.id}}/settings/syncing/settings).
forcesyncall.summary: Forcefully sync the profiles of everyone in this server.
forcesyncall.result.other: Unfortunately {{0}} other people couldn't be synced, perhaps they aren't connected to mellow...
forcesyncall.server_too_big: Server-wide force syncing is not available for this server, as mellow currently doesn't support member counts above 100.
setup.summary: Connect this Discord Server to mellow.
setup.signup:
## Account required
Before you can continue, you need to [sign-up](https://www.voxelified.com/sign-up) for a HAKUMI Account.
After that, if you did not sign-up with Discord, please connect your account [here](https://www.voxelified.com/settings/account/connections).
Execute this command again after completing these instructions.
setup.exists:
## Server already connected
This server is already connected to mellow, view it [here](https://www.voxelified.com/mellow/server/{{0}}/settings).
setup.done:
## Server connected
This server is now connected to mellow!
Configure it online [here](https://www.voxelified.com/mellow/server/{{0}}/settings).
